#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
     
int main(){
    int x;
    int y;
    cin >> x >> y;
    int l[x];
    for (int i = 0; i < x; i++){
		cin >> l[i];
    }
    int decide = 0;
    for (int i=0; i < x; i++){
		if (y%2 == 0){
			if (l[i] > (y/2)){
				cout << "NO" << endl;
				decide = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
		else{
			if (l[i] > (y/2+1)){
				cout << "NO" << endl;
				decide = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
    }
    if (decide == 0){
		cout << "YES" << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
